sentences.english: Splenic embolization in treatment of hypersplenism using both silk threads and gelfoam.
sentences.chinese: 丝线加明胶海绵脾脏栓塞治疗脾功能亢进。

sentences.english: She fell on some meat loaf, and it penetrated her spleen.
sentences.chinese: 她踩到块肉糜糕摔了一跤，它钻进了她的脾脏。

sentences.english: When liver disease is expected, splenomegaly should be sought.
sentences.chinese: 当怀疑肝病时，应该寻找肿大的脾脏。

sentences.english: Donor cells were detected in the spleen and peripheral blood of recipient.
sentences.chinese: 受者脾脏及外周可以检测到标记后增殖的供者细胞。

sentences.english: Nonparasitic splenic cyst is a rare clinical disease.
sentences.chinese: 非寄生虫性脾脏囊肿是一罕见的疾病。

sentences.english: Removal of aged RBC normally occurs by phagocytosis by the fixed macrophages of the spleen.
sentences.chinese: 老化的红细胞通常由脾脏巨噬细胞吞噬。

sentences.english: Massive hemoperitoneum and contractive spleen on CT might be indicated rupture of solid organ.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔大量积血与脾脏缩小提示实质器官破裂。

sentences.english: Metastasis of bronchopulmonary carcinoid tumors to the spleen is very rare.
sentences.chinese: 转移的支气管类癌的脾脏是非常罕见。

sentences.english: Methods A retrospective study was made on the clinical data of 10 cases of SMT.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾性分析10例脾脏恶性肿瘤的临床资料。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss clinical characteristics and treatment of primary splenic tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性脾脏肿瘤的临床诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Is milt intumescent how to treat?
Splenectomy might only be appropriate for patients with direct invasion of the spleen.
sentences.chinese: 脾切除术可能仅适用于胃癌直接侵犯脾脏者。

sentences.english: In such cases there may also be enlargement of the spleen.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，还可能出现脾脏肿大。

sentences.english: OPSI is a result of not having a spleen to fight certain bacterial infections.
sentences.chinese: OPSI的原因是没有脾脏来抵御某些细菌的感染。

sentences.english: Cysticerci were not found to grow in kidney or spleen all the time.
sentences.chinese: 在实验全过程中，肾脏和脾脏未见囊尾蚴寄生。

sentences.english: This condition is affecting your Spleen, causing your muscle atrophy and flaccidity .
sentences.chinese: 这种情况是影响你的脾脏，造成肌肉萎缩和松弛。

definition: spleen and stomach (digestive organs in TCM)/preferences/one's taste (e.g. in literature)
